import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Totop_div } from './style' class Totop extends Component { Totopclick(){ cancelAnimationFrame(timer); timer = requestAnimationFrame(function fn(){ let vtop=this.props.scroll; if(vtop>0){ vtop-50; timer = requestAnimationFrame(fn); }else{ cancelAnimationFrame(timer); } }) } render() { return (
600?"elevator elevator_fix":"elevator"}>
